meaningMnemonic: You put <radical>flowers</radical> on a <radical>cloud</radical> and call it <kanji>art</kanji>. Not everyone agrees that your flower cloud art is actually art, but you know it is.
readingMnemonic: Your beautiful <kanji>art</kanji> is going to be displayed at a <reading>gay</reading> (げい) club. Imagine the pride you feel about having your art on display.
